amendment.description: To permit States to pass laws to exempt such States from the provisions of this Act.

action.text: Amendment SA 4761 proposed by Senator Corker to Amendment SA 4751. (consideration: CR S4092-4095; text: CR S4093) To permit States to pass laws to exempt such States from the provisions of this Act.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4761 proposed by Senator Corker to Amendment SA 4751.
